title: Bandit Sivir
body: Make Bandit Sivir's throwing star match her splash image again (it was changed with her model update some time ago). In game she uses a 4 pointed star, in her splash she holds a 5 pointed star.

replies.body:
Have you seen Spectacular Sivir and Warrior Princess Sivir?
Her splashes for both shows her holding something similar to Classic; Spectacular Sivir's in-game model is a massive shuriken, and Warrior Princess's in-game model is what I like to call a pizza
